## Script (Python) "epub_process" ##bind container=container ##bind context=context ##bind namespace= ##bind script=script ##bind subpath=traverse_subpath ##parameters=self, REQUEST ##title=Epub-Process ## # --// BO epub_process //-- from Products.zms import standard
context.f_standard_html_request( context, REQUEST)
tempfolder = REQUEST['ZMS_FILTER_CUR_DIR'] base_url = context.absolute_url()[len(REQUEST['BASE0']):]+'/' c = 0 items = [] imgs = [] for ob in [context]+context.filteredTreeNodes( REQUEST, context.PAGES): id = 'main%i'%len(items) href = id+'.xhtml' filepath = '%s/%s'%(tempfolder,href) xml = [] xml.append(ob.getXmlHeader()) xml.append('<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xml:lang="en">') xml.append('<head>') xml.append('<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="css/style.css" />') xml.append('</head>') xml.append('<body>') bodyContent = ob.getBodyContent( REQUEST).replace(base_url,'') for img in bodyContent.split('<img'): src = img[img.find(' src="'):] src = src[src.find('"')+1:] src = src[:src.find('"')] if src and src not in imgs: imgs.append(src) xml.append(bodyContent) xml.append('</body>') xml.append('</html>') context.writeStdout('[epub_process]: %s'%filepath) standard.localfs_write( filepath, '\n'.join(xml)) items.append({'id':id,'href':href,'titlealt':ob.getTitlealt(REQUEST),'level':ob.getLevel(),})
# Generate toc.ncx (Table of Contents) xml = [] xml.append(context.getXmlHeader()) xml.append('<!DOCTYPE ncx PUBLIC "-//NISO//DTD ncx 2005-1//EN" "http://www.daisy.org/z3986/2005/ncx-2005-1.dtd">') xml.append('<ncx xmlns="http://www.daisy.org/z3986/2005/ncx/" version="2005-1" xml:lang="de-DE">') xml.append('<head>') xml.append('<meta name="dc:Title" content="%s"/>'%(context.getTitle(REQUEST))) xml.append('<meta name="dtb:uid" content="id_%s"/>'%(context.id_quote(context.getTitle(REQUEST)))) xml.append('</head>') xml.append('<docTitle>') xml.append('<text>%s</text>'%(context.getTitle(REQUEST))) xml.append('</docTitle>') xml.append('<navMap>') start_level = context.getLevel() last_level = start_level - 1 for x in range(len(items)): level = items[x]['level'] # Customize your deepest content Level if level <= 12: xml.extend(map(lambda x: '</navPoint>', range(last_level-level+1))) xml.append('<navPoint playOrder="%i" id="%s">\n'%(x+1,items[x]['id'])) xml.append('<navLabel>') xml.append('<text>%s</text>\n'%(items[x]['titlealt'])) xml.append('</navLabel>') xml.append('<content src="%s"/>\n'%(items[x]['href']))
last_level = level xml.extend(map(lambda x: '</navPoint>', range(last_level-start_level+1))) xml.append('</navMap>') xml.append('</ncx>') filepath = '%s/toc.ncx'%(tempfolder) context.writeStdout( '[epub_process]: %s'%filepath) standard.localfs_write( filepath, '\n'.join(xml))
# Generate content.opf xml = [] xml.append(context.getXmlHeader()) xml.append('<package version="2.0" unique-identifier="PrimaryID" xmlns="http://www.idpf.org/2007/opf">') xml.append('<metadata xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:opf="http://www.idpf.org/2007/opf">') xml.append('<dc:title>%s</dc:title>'%(context.getTitle(REQUEST))) xml.append('<dc:identifier id="dcidid" opf:scheme="URI">%s</dc:identifier>'%(context.absolute_url())) for key in context.getObjAttrs().keys(): dc_key = None if key.startswith('attr_dc_'): dc_key = 'dc:'+key[len('attr_dc_'):] if key.startswith('dc_'): dc_key = 'dc:'+key[len('dc_'):] if dc_key: value = context.attr(key) if value: context.writeStdout( '[epub_process]: %s'%dc_key) obj_attr = context.getObjAttr( key) xml.append('<%s>%s</%s>'%(dc_key,str(value),dc_key)) xml.append('</metadata>') xml.append('<manifest>') xml.append('<!-- Content Documents -->') xml.append('\n'.join(map(lambda x: '<item id="%s" href="%s" media-type="application/xhtml+xml"/>'%(x['id'],x['href']), items))) xml.append('<!-- Table of Contents -->') xml.append('<item id="ncx" href="toc.ncx" media-type="application/x-dtbncx+xml"/>') xml.append('<!-- CSS Style Sheets -->') xml.append('<item id="style-css" href="css/style.css" media-type="text/css"/>') xml.append('<!-- Images -->') for src in imgs: id = src id = id[:id.rfind('/')] id = id[id.rfind('/')+1:] ext = src[src.rfind('.')+1:] media_type = {'gif':'image/gif','jpg':'image/jpeg','png':'image/png',}[ext] xml.append('<item id="%s-%s" href="%s" media-type="%s"/>'%(id,ext,src,media_type)) xml.append('</manifest>') xml.append('<spine toc="ncx">') xml.append('\n'.join(map(lambda x: '<itemref idref="%s" linear="yes"/>'%(x['id']), items))) xml.append('</spine>') xml.append('</package>') filepath = '%s/content.opf'%(tempfolder) context.writeStdout( '[epub_process]: %s'%filepath) standard.localfs_write( filepath, '\n'.join(xml))
# Generate container.xml xml = [] xml.append(context.getXmlHeader()) xml.append('<container version="1.0" xmlns="urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:container">') xml.append('<rootfiles>') xml.append('<rootfile full-path="content.opf" media-type="application/oebps-package+xml"/>') xml.append('</rootfiles>') xml.append('</container>') filepath = '%s/META-INF/container.xml'%(tempfolder) context.writeStdout( '[epub_process]: %s'%filepath) standard.localfs_write( filepath, '\n'.join(xml))
# Convert transition to css. css = REQUEST['ZMS_FILTER_TRANS'].getData() filepath = '%s/css/style.css'%(tempfolder) context.writeStdout( '[epub_process]: %s'%filepath) standard.localfs_write( filepath, css)
# Build zip-archive zip = context.buildZipArchive( tempfolder+'/*') context.writeStdout( '[epub_process]: %i bytes'%len(zip)) standard.localfs_write( REQUEST.get('ZMS_FILTER_OUT'), zip) return zip
# --// EO epub_process //--
